column1: Careful. I believe  @rudyhavenstein  got banned for these types of jokes
His hair doesn’t move when he runs, impressive…
The progress of AI is worrisome.

COMMON MAN. dont do this.  not everybody reads your BIO & understands that you do satire!  twitter users have 100s of accounts they follow they JUST see your NAME & PIC!  its not less funny if you give people a LITTLE HINT: its a joke you can just add at the end a little ";-)"
